verses.name: Ephesians 4:15
verses.text: But speaking the truth in love, may grow up into him in all things, which is the head, even Christ:

verses.name: Ephesians 4:16
verses.text: From whom the whole body fitly joined together and compacted by that which every joint supplieth, according to the effectual working in the measure of every part, maketh increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love.

verses.name: Ephesians 4:17
verses.text: This I say therefore, and testify in the Lord, that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk, in the vanity of their mind,
